channel.title: Hugo on stuart crust

item.title: Third Time's The Charm
item.description: I've been meaning to start blogging for a while. Not even blogging consistently, just writing some long-form-ish pieces on projects that I've been working on, things I've learned, or things that I might want for my own reference. I've tried at least twice before - once when I purchased this domain back in December of 2013 and again at the end of 2016 - and as evidenced by the utter lack of content it's pretty clear I haven't been successful.
